doc.title: Morgen im Leben
doc.plot: Standing at the edge of his roof terrasse Bastian tells his one night stand Mona that in his life he has achieved everything he ever wished for. Then he jumps down and hits the ground. Besides his body - but hours before - bastis limousine arrives and we see present and past at the same time. Past-Bastian takes Past-Mona to his loft and sleeps with her while Present-Mona calls an ambulance and robs the dead Present-Basti. The story ends where it began - at the roof. But this time "somethin's different"
